title: Needs search by desription feature
comment: The unicode is just too huge to scroll around looking for the character you want. Plus there are many characters that are so similar but have codepoints far from one another. So this app is nice but crippled without being able to search by character description. A look at kcharselect source might help (but be careful not to get GPL'd!)

title: Simple but affective
comment: Took me a minute to find what I was looking for, could use a bit of a UI overhaul, but not gonna downgrade it since its still effective and simple.

title: Thank you so much.
comment: This is what exactly i want.

title: Stupid
comment: Download fancy text free insted.. ..it's slot better and it works
thanks so much..so handy and helpful....

title: Yeah
comment: What I've been finding for
Some obscure characters are just not displayed. I also wish I could create my own characters.

title: Useful.
comment: Very good way to enter special characters. I kind request to the developer: make the app pin to the status bar so that it may be used without closing the editing application viz Quickoffice etc.

title: Simple and easy to navigate
comment: This app is great, the only thing I think that would make it more efficient is to be able to copy multiple symbols and text to the clipboard at one. Also to be able to view the clipboard and edit it. It would nice if once you chose your symbols and the app closes is that it takes you back to your last used app; mine keeps taking me back to the home screen after I select a symbol.

title: Almost perfect.
comment: Others have said it better than I could.  Just needs a search function.  If it does, I have been unable to find it.

title: Wonderful
comment: I like It

title: Perfect Replacement for equivalent Windows app
comment: I was looking for an app to do what Windows' charmap does when I found this.  It is exactly what I wanted … and maybe more.  It fits my needs better than any of the other apps I saw.   I wish I could figure out how to link it to a keystroke.  Make that possible and I will add another star!

title: ?preferred font
comment: What font do you recommend as most universally usable?

title: Mostly What I Need
comment: Selecting the Mathematical Alphanumeric Symbols page from the menu gets me Chinese ideograms, but this was a minor need, with a workaround.

title: Good app
comment: This app works great but there is symbols that doesn't show

title: Needs something
comment: You guys need to develop a keyboard!!! This would be so much easier. Don't try to make it too "easy access" though, since it is a character map. Thank you guys for making the one and only good character map for android!!!

title: Lacking
comment: Needs ability to copy more than one character at a time. Otherwise good app, would recommend.

title: Can't see much characters
comment: There's a big mine of characters in this app, but I can see only 1-2% of them... How can I see all the characters?? Using a Xolo A500s...

title: Wooooow
comment: Could this get any better? Amazing!
It looks like it *could* be exactly what I want, but I can't find fonts to support runic, etc.    Can this app not include the required fonts to make it usable?

title: S3 user was HTC user
comment: App only copies one letter when on others it starts a sentence please fix and I will gladly change my rating....other then that its the BEST symbol app for sure.

title: You need an upgrade
comment: You need a clipboard as well this is annoyinf

title: Màny scripts dont seem to work àt all
Very useful
comment: Very useful, but I wish it were possible to adjust the size of the displayed characters. They are tiny, floating in the middle of a tile where there is room for a much larger display, and this makes them quite hard to read.

title: Very good
comment: App is as good as that on your pc

title: Excellent
comment: Excelente!

title: Great
comment: Great!!!!

title: Gd stuff
comment: Simple, unobtrusive, purposeful
just what I need

title: Superb
comment: This app has the obscure characters the Symbols app does not. But I recommend installing both. Symbols is fast and user friendly.

title: Excellent and simple but...
comment: I would give 5 stars if there was simply a "Unicode" or "All" category to just browse all the characters at once.

title: Clean, easy, effective
comment: Why aren't there more apps like this? Very nice. My only complaint is that I can't selectively hide character sets I never use. It would also be nice if it recognized my system font and hide unreadable characters. Otherwise, an awesome and effective app, free of ads!

title: It's a must
comment: I used to use pc from win to Lin now on android and such app is must to have installed. Pretty basic, just list, pick and copy then pasted somewhere.

title: excellent
comment: excellent application. has an inbuilt editor and occupies only a few KBs.

title: Pretty Good... But!
comment: -Should be a slide like in the contacts that changes the sets as u slide ur finger till uu Ger to the set u want.  -Should be able to at least search by set. -Sets not alphabetized.  -Have to keep scrolling and scrolling...

title: Squiggles
comment: 4 giggles.

title: Simple, effective!
comment: Was making a list of electronic parts and needed the 'micro' and 'ohm' symbols.  In 5 minutes I'd searched for an app, found this one, installed it, selected the 'Greek' section and put the required symbols into my list.

title: Exactly what it says
comment: No frills, spot on target. Lacking the last star because it could use with updating to Holo theme. Otherwise,  exactly the app you're looking for!

title: Awesome
comment: Exactly what I needed. It works perfectly. Thank You

title: This sucks
comment: When  Iwanted to put a symbol all the symbols are squares! >:l

title: Quick n Dirty no fluff Results
comment: Just what I want from a utility app. Provide exactly what you claim. Direct. Simple. Works. No hidden BS.

title: Awesome
comment: Great app, has all the characters!

title: Wow
comment: This is highly useful for inserting Unicode characters if one needs a specific one (far better than the other one I have used)

title: Exactly what I needed
comment: I wanted a simple tool that worked like Windows charmap and this one does not disappoint.

title: Needs serious updates.
comment: There are too many languages missing characters and there is severe disorganization.

title: Should be installed default
comment: Clean, simple interface. Does exactly what it says on the tin, without anything unnecessary.

title: Simple and functional
comment: Will do exactly what it says without adding bells & whistles to facilitate extracting money from you. Also, don't listen to the n00b further down in the comments, this app *does* have support for copying multiple characters.

title: Rr
comment: Great !!

comment: Just what I needed. The editor is quite helpful.
